synopsis: Animation included with the PLUS ULTRA version of the Boku no Hero Academia THE MOVIE: World Heroes' Mission Blu-ray/DVD release. It will be an adaptation of the "Hawks: SOOTHE" one-shot from the Vol. World Heroes booklet that was given out during the movie's theatrical run.

title.en: My Hero Academia the Movie: World Heroes' Mission - Tabidachi
title.jp: Boku no Hero Academia THE MOVIE: World Heroes' Mission - Tabidachi
